summary: BuildRequest had no explicit requirements; it only imposed deployment constraints and non-goals. The diff updates the deployment slug configuration to the specified valid slug, but also includes substantial product/feature and branding/content changes not requested and explicitly listed as non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded car rental functionality (backend API types/endpoints and frontend route/page/hooks).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is only about deploying/publishing using the existing configured slug and keeping SPA fallback; it explicitly lists adding new pages/features/content as a non-goal.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions new /car-rentals route, CarRentalsPage, new car rental submission hook)

hallucinated_features.description: Branding/content changes across UI (e.g., updated visible brand name, premium monochrome redesign).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly disallow changing branding/theme/contact details as part of this request; deployment-only request.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (index.css premium monochrome system; Header updated branding; About page updated branding/story; homepage premium sections)
project_state.json (summary references premium black/white branded frontend)

hallucinated_features.description: Contact details/content changes (phone/email/person name/office address shown in Contact/Inquiry UI and HomeContactBar).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly disallow changing contact details as part of this request.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (ContactInquiryPage updated contact information sidebar with phone 9373624669, email blackraystravelagency@gmail.com, MD & Chairman Om H Patil; HomeContactBar displays phone/email/MD & Chairman)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded authenticated admin area and profile management (Internet Identity login, admin guards, admin dashboard/pages, user profiles).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the deployment/publish BuildRequest; constitutes new functionality outside stated scope.
evidence: backend/main.mo (userProfiles, access control checks, admin-only create/update package)

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated deployment documentation (DEPLOYMENT.md) and additional slug validation logic beyond simply using the configured slug.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for additional documentation/validation code; only required using the existing platform-managed slug and not using the invalid one.
evidence: frontend/src/config/deployment.ts (validateDeploymentSlug, INVALID_SLUGS list, runtime console.error checks)
